title: Loud and Rich
content: In a group of N people (labelled ), each person has different amounts of money, and different levels of quietness. For convenience, we'll call the person with label , simply "person ". We'll say that if person definitely has more money than person . Note that may only be a subset of valid observations. Also, we'll say if person has quietness . Now, return , where if is the least quiet person (that is, the person with the smallest value of ), among all people who definitely have equal to or more money than person .
